name: ShootOut (Projekt_M)
description:
ShootOut is shooting game in early access

I'm going to push new updates to improve the game, and I'm thinking about putting this game on Google Play.

I would like to introduce you to ShootOut in this game where you can only shoot forward, which contributes to an interesting game.

This game contains:

  • 7 weapons
  • 13 upgrades
  • 3 dimensions
  • 15 levels
  • and I will add much more in the future

Since this game is still in development and will continue for a long time, I would like to receive feedback from you on this site in the comments or in Google forms: https://forms.gle/5zo3gp2BjNvYFC4a7
